name: Lovely Fox (itch)
description:
简介

控制小狐狸去冒险吧

素材：
用了Unity的Sunny Land作者是Ansimuz

感谢：
B站UP主M_Studio

开发者的话：

1.游戏有时候会更新。

2.游戏有些错误，不过玩家可以合理的使用错误，通关就更容易。

3.游戏可以玩速通了，可以把你们的记录晒到评论区哦。

4.此游戏版本过于早，更新的版本请去：https : //www.taptap.com/app/205577

Introduction

Control the little fox and go on an adventure

material:

The author of Sunny Land that uses Unity is Ansimuz

Thank:

bilibili:  M_Studio

Developer's words:

1. The game is sometimes updated.

2. There are some mistakes in the game, but players can use the mistakes reasonably and it will be easier to pass the level.

3. The game is ready to play speed pass, you can post your records in the comment area.

4. This game version is too early, please go to the updated version: https://www.taptap.com/app/205577
